TopicTitle: Fuel is disappearing from closed off tanks

Articles.Content:
Hey all, 

I have a problem where my monopropellant disappears after I reactivate the tank it's in. As in, during construction, I will close access to certain tanks (like my lander tanks) so that it isn't used during transit. However, when I hit that little fuel button so that the tank/fuel can be used again, all the fuel disappears. I'm currently sitting 15 Km over Minmus with no fuel in my lander. I've attached my installed mods and some screenshots.

Installed mods

Tank problems

Any help is appreciated.
